author: andschwa
body: This _appears_ to be `WCHAR* GetDomainNameW void  const;` used by `monad linux src monad wmi wbem Providers Win32Provider common sid.h`  However, this might instead be accomplished by `GetComputerNameEx`  where you send in the type of name you want   https   msdn.microsoft.com en us library windows desktop ms724301 v=vs.85 .aspx  Blocked until we have more information.  VSO create date - 8/31/2015 13:58:00
title: monad-native: GetDomainNameW
